landing.heroDescription: Manage your personal or shared expenses effortlessly. Upload receipts, categorize spending, and visualize where your money goes - all in one beautiful app.
landing.aiReceiptDescription: Upload receipts and let AI extract the details automatically
landing.visualAnalyticsDescription: Interactive charts and filters to understand your spending
landing.sharedAccountsDescription: Track expenses together with your partner or team
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage expenses
landing.featuresSubtitle: Built with modern tools for the best experience
landing.multipleAccountsDescription: Create separate accounts for personal, household, or work expenses. Keep your finances organized.
landing.categoriesTagsDescription: Organize expenses with custom categories and tags like vacation, work, or home.
landing.multiCurrencyDescription: Track expenses in any currency with automatic conversion to your preferred currency.
landing.darkModeDescription: Easy on the eyes with full dark mode support. Switch anytime.
landing.securePrivateDescription: Your data is encrypted and protected. No password needed - just a secure magic link.
landing.mobileFriendlyDescription: Access your expenses from any device. Works beautifully on desktop and mobile.

errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while loading this page.
errors.errorOccurred: An error occurred while loading your {resource}.

metadata.appDescription: Track and manage your expenses with ease. Simple, beautiful expense tracking for individuals and teams.
metadata.signInDescription: Sign in to your Gold-Finger account
